author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower glass u-channel tips…mortar and KERDI-FIX hold DECO-SG to the wall. No screws are needed. ZipWall poles are fantastic for clamping and keeping the channel plumb. Shower glass slides smoothly into the DECO-SG on the wall and floor 🔥#showerremodel #homerepairtutor #bathroomremodel #diy
title: Shower Glass U-Channel Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #diy
